pr_title: Ben pantheon urls resolve merge conflicts

timeline.message: Frontend now uses customer portal url api
Moved rewrite call into apis, no test case
Replaced a few more instances of url logic with new provider

timeline.author: carlosmunoz

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/pantheon-bundle/src/main/java/com/redhat/pantheon/extension/url/CustomerPortalUrlProvider.java b/pantheon-bundle/src/main/java/com/redhat/pantheon/extension/url/CustomerPortalUrlProvider.java
index 09f5d98..8f19795 100644
--- a/pantheon-bundle/src/main/java/com/redhat/pantheon/extension/url/CustomerPortalUrlProvider.java
+++ b/pantheon-bundle/src/main/java/com/redhat/pantheon/extension/url/CustomerPortalUrlProvider.java

@@ -7,6 +7,14 @@ import org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver;
 
 import java.util.Optional;
 
+/**
+ * Provides information on Customer Portal view url path.
+ * This class provides the following url fragments for Customer Portal view url.
+ *      URL_PRFIX,
+ *      document type
+ *      document locale
+ *      customer portal host
+ */
 public abstract class CustomerPortalUrlProvider implements UrlProvider {
 
     protected static final String URL_PREFIX = "/documentation/";

timeline.author: carlosmunoz

timeline.message: update single quotes to double, following best practices from typescriptlang.org and add class-level comment
